page.title: 18GAMBLING IN RAMSGATE
page.content: This area has several establishments where people can gamble.The Pleasurama company owns some of these,such as the Club Tiberius Casino,Cash Bingo,Prize Bingo & slot machine arcades.The Casino has roulette & blackjack tables.Locals gamble small amounts but the high-stake players are usually visiting Chinese & people from the Middle East.The cash Bingo has about 300 players on a good night who spend about $5 each & whose average age is about 50.The slotmachine arcades,once the magnet for visitors, are now open all year because they are the meeting places of many local teen- agers.In town are several Betting Shops where bets are placed on horse or dog races.Many people gamble on the foot- ball pools. Others "Have a Flutter" on raffles,prize draws,Premium Bonds and on greyhound racing at Ramsgate's Dumpton Park Track.
